meanings.sent1: She reappraised her collection of stamps to see which ones were valuable.
meanings.sent2: The real estate agent reappraised the house after renovations were completed.
meanings.sent3: After finding out the antique was fake, she reappraised her trust in the seller.
meanings.sent4: He reappraised his life choices after a near-death experience.
meanings.sent5: The teacher asked the students to reappraise their answers before submitting the test.

meanings.sent1: The manager reappraised the proposal before presenting it to the board.
meanings.sent2: She reappraised her decision to quit her job after receiving a better offer.
meanings.sent3: The detective reappraised the evidence and found a crucial clue.
meanings.sent4: He reappraised his opinion on the movie after hearing different perspectives.
meanings.sent5: The scientist reappraised the experiment to ensure accurate results.
